name: Blob Boy and the Castle of Doom
name_original: Blob Boy and the Castle of Doom
description:
Blob Boy and the Castle of Doom is a  2D adventure platformer that focuses on exploration, hazards, and skill. This game was developed by a team of students for the Capstone project of the Game Design Program at Full Sail University. 

The player’s main goal in the game is to collect three Triangles Keys in total in all the levels to get the treasure at the end. Along the way, players will explore each level to find the exit and potentially any collectibles they may find. In each level, there will be purposefully placed hazards that include arrows traps, spike pits, pitfalls, falling and moving platforms that will challenge the player in unique ways.  Skill is a key aspect in each level as players will have to navigate and avoid enemies, other hazards to reach the end of the level without dying.
